attributes.action: Call an end to the ridiculous charade that will make us pay to park in Eastbourne
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The local and county council have systematically created a parking problem in Eastbourne where none existed, unnecessarily paving roads over, creating one-way streets and adding arbitrary yellow lines. The plan is to make everyone pay to park to raise money. Even residents will have to purchase permits. Nobody wants this scheme as continuous petitions and objections have proven.
